game.name: You All Know! Arm Tank Volley
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 여러분 오래 기다리셨습니다! 전설의 “다들 아는” 암 탱크 발리가 나왔습니다! 암 탱크의 도를 익히세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Thank you for waiting! The legendary "You All Know! Arm Tank Volley" is finally here! Master the way of the Arm Tank!
